mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( member_id, ac_code, member_pw, member_level, member_name, member_gender, member_birth, member_phone, member_date ) VALUES ( #{m_id}, #{ac_code}, #{m_pw}, #{m_level}, #{m_name}, #{m_gender}, #{m_birth}, #{m_phone}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO profes_info ( idprinfo_code, ac_code, member_id, admin_id, idprinfo_subject, idprinfo_education, idprinfo_date ) VALUES ( #{prInfo_code}, #{ac_code}, #{m_id}, #{admin_id}, #{prInfo_subject}, #{prInfo_edu}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(idprinfo_code,10) AS DECIMAL)) AS maxcol FROM profes_info
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Stu_PI ( stu_info_code, ac_code, stu_id, admin_id, drive_code, stu_school, parents_phone, stu_brother, stu_info_etc ) VALUES ( #{stu_info_code}, 'ac001', #{m_id}, #{admin_id}, 'drive_info01', #{stu_school}, #{parents_phone}, #{stu_brother}, #{stu_info_etc} )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(stu_info_code,9) AS DECIMAL)) AS maxcol FROM Stu_PI
